roleset.name: challenge, nom/nomadj-challenging

example.name: challenge-v: disagree with
example.text: The filing adds a new twist to market speculation that Coniston Partners , a New York money manager , has bought more than 5 % of UAL stock and may challenge the UAL board 's decision last week to remain independent .

propbank.arg: Coniston Partners , a New York money manager
the UAL board 's decision last week to remain independent

example.name: challenge-v: with task
example.text: Barney Barnhardt , a 727 captain and leader of the pro - union forces , said he has received two anonymous death threats and been challenged to a fight with tire irons by a colleague .

propbank.arg: to a fight with tire irons

example.name: challenge-n: Args 1 & 2
example.text: Thousands more staged protests in three other cities in a fresh challenge to the Communist leadership to introduce democratic freedoms .

example.name: challenge-n: Arg 2 only
example.text: The challenge of feeding a starving population and fighting a war was beyond the government 's ability .

propbank.arg: of feeding a starving population and fighting a war

example.name: challenge-n: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Her challenge of the assumption that extra dimensions must be tiny has stirred the physics community .

propbank.arg: of the assumption that extra dimensions must be tiny

example.name: challenge-n: Arg0 only
example.text: Jane and Bob signed on for the BP Challenge , a sailboat race around the world .

example.name: challenge-n: Arg 0 as from PP
example.text: Will the heavyweight champion accept this challenge from the young Bulgarian fighter ?

example.name: challenge-n: all Arguments
example.text: She conveys the buried feminist message of the film in her challenge to Dan to take responsibility for his sexual behavior .

propbank.arg: to take responsibility for his sexual behavior

example.name: challenging-j: Arg2 only
example.text: The trust we had built with many was eroded and our ability to gain trust with others was much more challenging .

propbank.arg: our ability to gain trust with others

example.name: challenging-j: With challenged entity
example.text: The game was challenging to me when I was younger , but I have beat this game many of times now .

roleset.note: CHALLENGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'challenge' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison. (from challenge.01-v predicate notes)
CHALLENGE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb challenge.01, OntoNotes grouping challenge-n senses 1, 2, 3, 5 & 6; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from challenge.01-n)

CHALLENGING-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Loosely based on challenge.01, but differs from verb frame in that the Arg0 agentive challenger can't occur with the adjective. (from challenging.01-j)
